summary: This bill, the "Stop Holding Up Taxpayers, Deny wages On Washington’s Negligence Act" (SHUTDOWN Act), proposes to impose a daily tax on members of Congress during any lapse in appropriations. The tax amount is calculated based on the member's wages and the number of days the lapse occurs. The bill amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and would apply to taxable years starting after December 31, 2024.
